citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to allow access to and accompany inspection at ( April 1 2015 12:30 pm )
Contace me Jerry West with a time someone will normally be available for inspection

narrative:
2.126(a)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
 
 A responsible adult was not available to allow access to and accompany inspection at (  April 1 2015 12:30 pm )
 Contace me Jerry West  with a time someone will normally be available for inspection
